title: CAN WE TALK ABOUT RUINED KING!?  A single player turn based RPG!
body:
https://ruinedking.com/

Taking place after Burning Tides, Ruined King, the first game announced to be made through the Riot Forge program is a single player turn based league of legends RPG!

In it you will explore Bilgewater and the Shadow Isles.  It promises a unique take on turn based combat.

Can we _talk about this!?_

This is amazing!!!

so can someone explain to me what riot forge is? cause i was honestly too lazy to read their news articles (and i just dont wanna read them as they tend to talk so much obvious shit)

It's a publisher within Riot. Since "Riot Games" does ongoing, competitive multiplayer stuff, they wanted to have a space for completable single-player games. So they let other devs make their games and support them in the whole process.

First two games that were announced are Ruined King, Turn-Based RPG in Bilgewater/SI, developed by Airship Syndicate, and Conv/rgence, Platformer with Ekko in Zaun, developed by Double Stallion.

so basically other devs work together with riot?
that sounds really nice.

Yes, I do think it's the perfect decision. 
Everyone wants Riot to do more games, but the truth is that they don't have much experience in making SP-titles. 
This way they can focus on their stuff, and then there is Riot Forge for everything else.
it indeed is a great decision. this way riot can spice games up without being in charge (or as id call it without ruining them)
